title: Injury Forces La Voix's Exit from Strictly Come Dancing
summary: La Voix, a drag queen contestant on Strictly Come Dancing, has withdrawn from the competition after sustaining an injury, as announced by host Tess Daly during the show's episode in Blackpool. The performer, whose real name is Chris Dennis, expressed disappointment on Instagram, stating that medical advice prevented her from continuing. This led to the cancellation of the weekly dance-off, with votes being carried over to the next episode. La Voix gained popularity as a finalist on RuPaul's Drag Race UK and aimed to showcase her true self through the character. The injury highlights a pattern on the show, as other contestants like Stefan Dennis and Dani Dyer have also left due to injuries recently. The article reports on the impact of physical demands in dance competitions and how shows adapt to unforeseen circumstances, using sources like official announcements and social media posts for information.
